SELECT
tu.USERNAME as username, tu.AVATAR as img, ps.id as sId, ps.username as susername, ps.type as stype, ps.user_img as suserImg, ps.create_date as screateDate,
pd.id as dId, pd.username as dusername, pd.create_date as dcreateDate, pd.user_img as duserImg,
pc.username as cusername, pc.id as cId, pc.create_date as ccreateDate, pc.user_img as cuserImg, pt.p_type as productionType, xp.*
from t_user tu
INNER JOIN xg_production xp on xp.user_id =tu.USER_ID LEFT JOIN xg_production_share ps on ps.p_id =xp.id LEFT join xg_production_dz pd on pd.p_id =xp.id LEFT JOIN xg_production_collection pc on pc.p_id =xp.id LEFT join xg_production_type pt on pt.id =xp.type where tu.user_id =#{userId}
